variables.desc: GOG.com (formerly Good Old Games) is a digital distribution platform for video games and films. It is operated by GOG sp. z o.o., a wholly owned subsidiary of CD Projekt, based in Warsaw, Poland. GOG.com delivers DRM-free video games through its digital platform for Microsoft Windows, macOS and Linux.
GOG.com (anciennement Good Old Games) est un service commercial de distribution numérique de jeux vidéo sans DRM en ligne, mis en place en 2008 par l'éditeur polonais CD Projekt.
